mapper.select: select l.land_idx, l.name, l.image "image", l.latitude, l.longitude, l.detail, l.city_idx, c.name "city_name", c.time_difference from landmark l, city c where l.city_idx = c.city_idx and c.name = #{city_name}
select c.name from city c,country co where c.country_idx = co.country_idx and co.name = #{country_name}

insert all into SCHEDULE values(schedule_seq.nextval,#{title},#{start_day},#{end_day},1)
into selected_landmark values(schedule_seq.currval,#{item.land_idx},#{item.position})
into selected_item values(get_item_seq(),#{item.name},#{item.image},#{item.detail},#{item.price},schedule_seq.currval,#{item.position})
